title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Mastering Linear Algebra Symbolic Systems: Task-Based Mobile Learning

learning_goals: Identify and interpret core linear algebra symbols (e.g., matrix notation, vector space operators) with 90% accuracy
